x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tchval.n | |- G = ( toCHil ` W ) |
| 2 |  | tchtopn.d | |- D = ( dist ` G ) |
| 3 |  | tchtopn.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` W ) = ( Base ` W ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_tchex | |- ( x e. ( Base ` W ) |-> ( sqrt ` ( x ( .i ` W ) x ) ) ) e. _V |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .i ` W ) = ( .i ` W ) |
| 7 | 1, 4, 6 | #P_tchval | |- G = ( W toNrmGrp ( x e. ( Base ` W ) |-> ( sqrt ` ( x ( .i ` W ) x ) ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( MetOpen ` D ) = ( MetOpen ` D ) |
| 9 | 7, 2, 8 | #P_tngtopn | |- ( ( W e. V /\ ( x e. ( Base ` W ) |-> ( sqrt ` ( x ( .i ` W ) x ) ) ) e. _V ) -> ( MetOpen ` D ) = ( TopOpen ` G ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( W e. V -> ( MetOpen ` D ) = ( TopOpen ` G ) ) |
| 11 | 10, 3 | #P_syl6reqr | |- ( W e. V -> J = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) |
